title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. The second point can be earned if an incorrect number of moles is used correctly in the second calculation.
descriptions: The response does not include a calculation equivalent to either of the following and the corresponding answer.
The response includes a calculation equivalent to one of the following and the corresponding answer.

title: Part C(i)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include the correct claim and a valid justification, such as follows.

No, this is not a reasonable proposal. A fingerprint on the cuvette would cause the measured absorbance to be too high rather than too low.

The response includes the correct claim and a valid justification, such as follows.

No, this is not a reasonable proposal. A fingerprint on the cuvette would cause the measured absorbance to be too high rather than too low.

title: Part C(iii)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include a calculation equivalent to the following and the corresponding answer.

From the reaction stoichiometry, the equilibrium partial pressure of N 2 O 4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1B TfMBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8rk0le9v8qqaqFD0xXdHaVhbbf9v8 qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9 q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaqaafaaake aacaqGobWaaSbaaSqaaiaaikdaaeqaaOGaae4tamaaBaaaleaacaqG 0aaabeaaaaa@3D45@ will be half of the difference between the initial pressure and the equilibrium partial pressure of NO 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1B TfMBaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8rk0le9v8qqaqFD0xXdHaVhbbf9v8 qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFfea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9 q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaqaafaaake aacaqGobGaae4tamaaBaaaleaacaqGYaaabeaaaaa@3C51@ .
